li.label: Dreamt about playing racing game
li.description: The archotech computer lab was cool and dark, but had a circular track around the perimeter inside. Somebody challenged me to a race, and I won!

li.label: Dreamt about bathing in noodles
li.description: Noodles! Noodles everywhere! The best meal in the whole universe!

li.label: Dreamt about partying naked
li.description: I was walking around colony, when I realised that I'm wearing no clothes! I looked around and noticed that everyone took off their clothes as they saw me! We started to drink and dance around our home naked.

li.label: Dreamt about being a racoon
li.description: I was a small animal (I think it was a raccoon?) in a random windy forest. It was pretty nice even if all I did was wander around and occasionally see other creatures, and at some point I think I befriended a groundhog. I'm not too sure on how it ended but the last thing I vaguely remember was seeing buildings over a hill. ~~okoyum

li.label: Dreamt about flying
li.description: I was flying in my dream dream! It was an amazing experience. I just wanted it to keep going...

li.label: Dreamt about murder
li.description: Motionless body lays in front of me and I watch it. The blood pool keeps getting bigger. I don't remember why I killed this person but it feels so damn good.

li.label: Dreamt about eating someone
li.description: Eating a human being is simple. I used to think of it as a disgusting thing, but simply trying this delicacy proved me wrong!
